title: Observability Pack Configuration
description: A minimal schema definition for Observability Packs

name.description: The overall name of the Observability Pack

description.description: A short form description for this Observability Pack

level.description: The support level provided to this Observability Pack

authors.description: The support level provided to this Observability Pack

type.description: The type of New Relic Product the instrumentation falls under

title.description: The name of the pack displayed every the pack is referenced

short-description.description: Displayed in search results and recommendations

full-description.description: Displayed on the pack overview/details page formatted into rich text

tags.description: Tags for filtering / searching criteria in the New Relic Platform and GraphQL API

thumbnail.description: Displayed in listings and in 'my packs'

screenshots.description: Only used if pack has a Nerdpack or a Dashboard

contributors.description: Contains avatar, GitHub username, and link to GitHub profile for each contributor

icon.description: Path to icon for this Observability Pack

logo.description: Path to logo for this Observability Pack

website.description: URL of website for this Observability Pack
